data.title: Trade Union Act, 1941
meta_keywords: Irish Statute Book; irish legislation; Acts; statutory instruments; constitution
data.meta_description: The electronic Irish Statute Book (eISB) comprises the Acts of the Oireachtas (Parliament), Statutory Instruments, Legislation Directory, Constitution and a limited number of pre-1922 Acts.
data.text: AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE LICENSING OF BODIES CARRYING ON NEGOTIATIONS FOR FIXING WAGES OR OTHER CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYMENT, TO PROVIDE FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A TRIBUNAL HAVING POWER TO RESTRICT THE RIGHTS OF ORGANISATION OF TRADE UNIONS, AND FOR OTHER MATTERS CONNECTED WITH THE MATTERS AFORESAID. [23rd September, 1941.]
